General.Name: Yunnan Yuntianhua Co Ltd
General.Description: Yunnan Yuntianhua Co., Ltd. engages in the chemical fertilizer and agriculture, phosphate mining, fine chemicals, and trade and logistics businesses in China. The company provides phosphate fertilizer, nitrogen fertilizer, monoammonium phosphate, diammonium phosphate, urea, and compound fertilizer. It also offers thermal phosphoric acid, feed grade calcium hydrogen phosphate, yellow phosphorus, fluorine-containing nitrobenzene, and other products. In addition, the company produces polyoxymethylene, pentaerythritol, and methanol products. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Kunming, China.
